== Before starting. ==

Before upgrading it is recommended that you read the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HirsuteHippo/ReleaseNotes/Kubuntu | release notes for Kubuntu 21.04]]</nowiki>, which document caveats and workarounds for known issues in this version.

== Upgrade Kubuntu from 20.10 to 21.04 ==

If you are using a Laptop ensure the following things are done.

You will need to:
* Ensure your laptop is connected to power.
* If at all practical, ensure that you are connected to the Internet via a wired connection.
* Ensure your current installation is updated.
* Switch your upgrade settings from LTS only to 'normal'.
* Run the release upgrade tool.
* Reboot.

For Desktops:

You will need to:
* Ensure your current installation is updated.
* Switch your upgrade settings from LTS only to 'normal'.
* Run the release upgrade tool.
* Reboot.

=== Ensure your laptop is connected to power. ===

The upgrade should run uninterrupted.

=== If at all practical, ensure that you are connected to the Internet via a wired connection. ===

The upgrade may change your wireless networking applications and drivers.

=== Ensure your current installation is updated. ===

==== Install Updates. ====

Run Plasma Discover and install all available updates; or

in Konsole run <pre>
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
</pre>

----

=== Upgrade. ===

Ensure that the package ubuntu-release-upgrader-qt is installed.

Run in Krunner.

<pre>
pkexec do-release-upgrade -m desktop -f DistUpgradeViewKDE
</pre>

Alternatively if you wish to do the entire upgrade in a terminal, in Konsole do;

<pre>
sudo do-release-upgrade -m desktop
</pre>

=== The Release Upgrade tool will be downloaded and started. ===

Follow instructions to complete the upgrade.

=== Restart ===

Restart your computer when prompted.

== Welcome to Kubuntu 21.04 ==

Your computer should boot into Kubuntu 21.04, with the new Plasma 5.21 desktop.
